translations: n.确定的事，必然的事（certainty 的复数）

sentences.sentence: There are no certainties in modern Europe.
I think Milton is encouraging us to question, to wrestle with the theological certainties that the rest of the poem labors to establish.
sentences.translation: 我认为弥尔顿鼓励我们去质疑，去与神学上的确定性搏斗，而这正是这首诗的其余部分所努力建立的。
